com.mostc.pftt.model.core
Class PhpBuild

java.lang.Object
  com.mostc.pftt.model.Build
      com.mostc.pftt.model.sapi.SAPIManager
          com.mostc.pftt.model.core.PhpBuild

public class PhpBuild
extends SAPIManager

Represents a single build of PHP. Has functions to check build type, architecture, compiler, etc... configure and execute PHP scripts with the build. (all the functions to check build type are all here, so if that procedure ever changes, just update this class) To be clear, NTS and TS builds that were built together, even from the same configuration and source, are still considered two separate builds.

Author:
Matt Ficken

public java.lang.String getDefaultPhpIniPath(Host host,
                                             ESAPIType type)
calculates path on Host to php.ini used for this build and SAPIs(cgi, cli). On Windows, php.ini is stored in same place for all SAPIs. On others, different SAPIs have different php.inis.

isExtensionEnabled

public boolean isExtensionEnabled(ConsoleManager cm,
                                  AHost host,
                                  ESAPIType type,
                                  PhpIni ini,
                                  java.lang.String ext_name)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
checks to see if the extension is enabled or statically builtin to this build Note that PhpIni#hasExtension only checks to see if the extension is enabled in a PhpIni whereas #isExtensionEnabled checks to see if its enabled. PhpIni#hasExtension will miss builtin/static extensions.

host -
type -
ext_name -

getExtensionList

public java.lang.String[] getExtensionList(ConsoleManager cm,
                                           AHost host,
                                           PhpIni ini)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
gets the static builtin extensions for this build build and the dynamic extensions the PhpIni loads (minus any extensions that can't actually be loaded). on Windows, if a dynamic extension (.DLL) can't be loaded for some reason (binary compatibility, missing file) a Popup dialog box will be shown which will block execution until OK is clicked. In that case, this will kill PHP after 1 minute and fail to detect any extensions.

Parameters:
cm -
host -
ini -
Returns:
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getDefaultExtensionDir

public java.lang.String getDefaultExtensionDir()
returns the default extension directory that will be used for this build if not overriden by a PhpIni directive

Returns:
